name: Aravind Datla
title: AI/ML Engineer
professional_summary: Developed AI-powered diagnostic tools using Python and TensorFlow to analyze medical imaging data while ensuring HIPAA compliance, reducing diagnosis time by approximately 40% for radiologists at major healthcare facilities.

Engineered machine learning models with PyTorch to predict patient readmission risks, integrating with existing hospital systems through secure APIs that maintained strict data privacy standards under healthcare regulations.

Created intelligent document processing system using Langchain and OpenAI API to extract critical information from medical records, automating what was previously a manual process taking several hours per patient file.

Built predictive fraud detection models for banking transactions using deep learning techniques with Keras, implementing real-time monitoring that identified suspicious patterns while minimizing false positives.

Implemented Hugging Face transformers to analyze customer sentiment from banking interactions, creating dashboards that helped executives identify service issues before they escalated into major problems.

Designed multi-modal AI system for automotive applications that combined computer vision and sensor data, improving autonomous vehicle decision-making in complex urban environments with varying weather conditions.

Developed intelligent recommendation engine using Amazon Bedrock for automotive customers, personalizing vehicle features and options based on driving patterns and preferences while maintaining data privacy.

Created conversational AI assistant for consulting clients using OpenAI API and custom fine-tuning, reducing response time to common inquiries by approximately 60% while maintaining professional tone.

Architected scalable data processing pipeline with Apache Airflow and TensorFlow to handle millions of healthcare records daily, ensuring consistent performance during peak usage periods without compromising security.
Implemented Google Model Garden models to analyze banking customer behavior patterns, identifying opportunities for personalized financial products while adhering to strict regulatory requirements.
Engineered real-time anomaly detection system for automotive manufacturing using PyTorch and computer vision, identifying quality issues on the production line before they became costly recalls.

Developed custom NLP models using Hugging Face to extract insights from consulting project documentation, creating knowledge graphs that helped teams leverage past experiences for new client engagements.

Created intelligent document classification system using Langchain and OpenAI API to organize healthcare records, improving retrieval efficiency for medical professionals while maintaining HIPAA compliance.

Built predictive maintenance models for banking IT infrastructure using TensorFlow, preventing system outages that could impact customer transactions and ensuring 99.9% uptime during critical business hours.
Implemented Nvidia Nim for accelerated inference of AI models in automotive applications, reducing processing time for real-time decision-making systems in autonomous vehicles by approximately 50%.

Designed ethical AI framework for consulting projects, ensuring that machine learning models were transparent and fair while still delivering valuable business insights to clients across various industries.
Developed federated learning approach for healthcare data analysis using PyTorch, allowing multiple hospitals to collaboratively train models without sharing sensitive patient information.

Created intelligent automation system for banking compliance using OpenAI API and custom fine-tuning, reducing manual review time for regulatory documents while improving accuracy in identifying potential issues.
